title: East West Balance Acupuncture - Gordon Multimedia
description: The East West Balance Acupuncture clinic wanted to represent both the traditional Eastern influence and at the same time maintain a Western medical/modern look. The site not only achieves this, but also has helped them increase their business through better search engine visibility.
cleaned_text: East West Balance Acupuncture The East West Balance Acupuncture clinic wanted to represent both the traditional Eastern influence and at the same time maintain a Western medical/modern look. The site not only achieves this, but also has helped them increase their business through better search engine visibility. Visit this [Wellesley acupuncture](http://www.eastwestbalanceacupuncture.com) website.
